issue.title: [C++] Implement hash_aggregate kernels (umbrella issue)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13339](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13339). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Umbrella issue to track implementation of hash aggregate kernels.
